00030 namespace uStreamLib {
00031         /*
00032          * Declare a Pin and a Block.
00033          */
00034         class Pin;
00035         class Block;
00036 
00044         class US_EXPORT Wire : public Object {
00045         public:
00051                 enum { 
00052                 UNIDIRECTIONAL = 0, 
00053                 BIDIRECTIONAL = 1 };
00054 
00058                 Wire(void);
00059 
00065                 virtual ~Wire(void);
00066 
00071                 int32 init(int32 type);
00072 
00085                 virtual int32 connect(Block* b1, Pin* p1, Block* b2, Pin* p2);
00086 
00092                 Pin* getPin(int32 which)
00093                 {
00094                         return (which <= 1 ? _p1 : _p2);
00095                 }
00096 
00102                 BufferPool* getBufferPool(int32 which)
00103                 {
00104                         return (which <= 1 ? _bp1 : _bp2);
00105                 }
00106 
00111                 char* getErrorString(void)
00112                 {
00113                         return _error_string.get();
00114                 }
00115         private:
00116                 /*
00117                  * Other constructors.
00118                  */
00119                 Wire(Wire&)
00120                         : Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_WIRE)
00121                 {
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 /* type of the wire */
00125                 int32 _type;
00126 
00127                 /* buffer pool for pin 1 */
00128                 BufferPool* _bp1;
00129 
00130                 /* buffer pool for pin 2 */
00131                 BufferPool* _bp2;
00132 
00133                 /* connected pin 1 */
00134                 Pin* _p1;
00135 
00136                 /* connected pin 2 */
00137                 Pin* _p2;
00138 
00139                 /* buffer for error string */
00140                 SharedString _error_string;
00141 
00142                 /* flag: multipoint connection on bp1 */
00143                 bool _multipoint_on_bp1;
00144 
00145                 /* flag: multipoint connection on bp2 */
